short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Events Open Automatically, Whenever you Need Them to!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Patent Pending Browser Extension that allows users to store online events and open the URLs at the exact date and time. See a master list of all your events, and soon you will be able to sync your external calendar. 

You can turn on/off the auto-open function, as well as delete upcoming events if needed. If the automatic open feature is turned off, you can still access the event in the provided hyperlink!
